message: Hi Bob, thanks for your interest in the product. I'm happy to kick off negotiations at $1,500,000. I believe this reflects the true value of what's being offered.
Hi Alice, thanks for your opening offer. That price is a little too high for me right now. I'm willing to offer $650,000 for the product.

Hi Bob, I appreciate your counter offer, however, $650,000 is significantly below its market value. I'm willing to come down to $1,350,000. This is a fair offer considering the product's unique features and potential for your business.

Alice, I understand the product's value, but $1,350,000 is still beyond my current budget.  I can offer $700,000.  This is a significant investment on my part and reflects my serious interest in the product.

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but the gap between our positions is still quite large. I'm willing to consider $1,200,000  as my final offer. Please understand that I have other interested buyers and need to see serious commitment from your side.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $1,200,000 is still more than I'm prepared to spend. To be completely transparent, I do have another offer for the product at a significantly lower price point. I'm still very interested in working with you, but I need to see some movement on the price to make this work. I'm willing to offer $750,000. This represents a significant compromise on my part.
